about_the_game:
A hardcore first person PvPvE horror experience, set in the R.E.Z., also known as the Reality Exclusion Zone. This zone occupies the former USSR territory around Chernobyl, since the nuclear cascade event.

Bandits, thugs, and private military contractors come from a number of countries to infiltrate the R.E.Z., learn it's secrets, recover strange and valuable artifacts, and attempt to leave with their lives. Most do not succeed.

The average lifespan of a Liquidator is estimated to be 4 years.

But for the successful?

Riches beyond measure.


Heavily inspired by games such as S.T.A.L.K.E.R. and Escape from Tarkov, featuring;
- Multiplayer FPS PvP & PvE gameplay
- Tactical, hardcore military gunplay
- Inventory management
- Immersive sound design
- RPG levelling elements

name: The Liquidators

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A hardcore FPS PvPvE horror experience, set in the reality exclusion zone around the Chernobyl Event and inspired by games like S.T.A.L.K.E.R. and Escape from Tarkov.
